Community engagement initiatives like the 2023 Feed the Children partnership

sources.snippet: In 2023, Americold and Feed the Children partnered with the City of Atlanta, Georgia, to host four community outreach events aimed at temporarily alleviating food insecurity for 1,200 local families.
